item.title: Very bright Light at car wash left on all night. Considerable light pollution into our home throughout the night, 22nd August

item.title: Overgrown shrub at base of street tree blocking pavement, 22nd August
item.description:
A large shrub has been growing around the base of the street tree outside 102/104 king edward rd. It is now spreading onto the pavement, making it difficult for pedestrians to walk past safely. The growth has been there for several months

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): King Edwards Road, Hackney, London
